question: Which of the following statements is correct with respect to 'Agnikula' origin of the Rajputs?
option1: Rajputs were descendants of the four brave warriors who were born out of the firepit at Mount Abu.
option2: Rajputs were the descendants of the Vedic Kshatriyas.
option3: Rajputs were the descendants of foreigners.
option4:
Rajputs were the
descendants ofthe indigenous tribes such as the Gonds and Bhars.
answer: Rajputs were descendants of the four brave warriors who were born out of the firepit at Mount Abu.
explanation: According to the Agnikula origin theory the Rajputs were descendants of the four brave warriors who were born out of the firepit at Mount Abu. This is called the Agnikula origin of the Rajputs.
